title: Galicia (Spain)
summary: Galicia (/ɡəˈlɪʃ(i)ə/;[2] Galician: Galicia [ɡaˈliθjɐ] or Galiza [ɡaˈliθɐ];[lower-alpha 1] Spanish: Galicia, Portuguese: Galiza) is an autonomous community of Spain and historic nationality under Spanish law.[3] Located in the northwest Iberian Peninsula, it includes the provinces of A Coruña, Lugo, Ourense and Pontevedra.
